comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: A Naval Militia in the USA is usually part of the State defence organization. Here's info on New York's one: www.dmna.state.ny.us/nynm/naval.php

comment.author: 15283643@N04
comment._content: The dates on both the negative and the sticker begin with 4 and end with 7 or 17, indicating April 1917. The original day of the month appears to have been changed, possibly corrected.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: So here's another instance of Bain's reuse of a 1913 military photo after Wilson's (and Congress's) declaration of war against Germany (April 6, 1917).
